name: Mustache in Hell
description: A trip to hell. Hordes of demons. Big guns. Insane combat encounters. Pixel art mustaches. It's going to be a long day for Officer John Mustache.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: Dual Core/I3 Memory: 3 GB RAM Graphics: On Board Card DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 65 MB available space Sound Card: Onboard sound card
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: Core I5 Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: On Board Card DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 65 MB available space Sound Card: Onboard sound card

reviews.review_text: Graphics - 8.0 Sound - 7.5 Gameplay - 9.0 Overall - 9.0  Awesome Game
